data.title: Replaced the AlliedMissiles boolean on JamsMissiles by a Stances field
data.body: Fixes the first part of #9382. (`JamsRadar` will be updated in another PR.)

data.title: Do not apply the cell's Z offset twice during crate positioning.
data.body: Fixes #11861.

data.title: Selecting a map with zero player spots resets player color in settings.
Spectator in-game chat
data.body:
Suggestion:

This might be a good way to give spectators the possibility to chat freely, while not disclosing any information to the playing parties. 

Chat channels: 
- General [All Players] 
- Team [Team Only]
- Spectators [Special Team]

data.title: Attack-move inconsistency
data.body:
steps to reproduce , to understand what im referring to : 
- select a bunch of units
- press "one time" "A" (assuming thats your attack-move hotkey)
- [the cursor should be red now] 
- right click "one time" on a free spot (your units will start attack-moving)
 
what does the cursor look like now ? 

  
  now do this : 
- select a bunch of units
- press "A" and keep holding "A" (assuming thats your attack-move hotkey)
- [cursor should be red now]
- while still holding "A" ... make a right click on a free spot (your units will start attack-moving)
- release "A" ... 

what does the cursor look like now ? 

so basicly , when i keep holding A ... instead of only pressing it one time ... i will stuck in "attack-move-mode" ... and i have to do a "inbetween-left-click" to free myself from it 

and this "inbetween-left-click" can get quite annoying while in combat

data.title: Infantry blinks in a stand frame after a long L turn.

milestone.title: Future
milestone.description: This milestone is meant for stuff we want fixed, but don't have a timeline for yet. Also a collection of pull requests left undone.

data.body:
Example (recorded on a Timestep of 100, sorry about it):
![blinkinf](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1136302/18027253/6a715fa2-6c5f-11e6-94d9-0df6b5e7a0d1.gif)

Particular frame:
![092](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1136302/18027247/4382203e-6c5f-11e6-8218-c026fd701aa6.gif)

Pretty sure this is a recent regression.

data.title: Official Map Pool - Ins and Outs

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body:
We ought to take advantage of the work done by the community to refresh the official map pool for the next playtest and release.

Removing:
- Snowy Ridge (3 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/13064/ (swap with Icy Ridge)
- Equal Opportunity (4 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/13666/
- First come, First served (4 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/12328/
- Calm before the storm (4 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/12596/ (swap with X-Lake)
- Marooned II (6 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/12791/
- Suffrage (6 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/12482/
- Great Sahara (8 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/13088/ (swap with Great Sahara 2)

Adding:
- Barren Land (2 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15123/
- Desert Rats (2 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15904/
- Icy Ridge (3 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15907/ 
- Tandem (4 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15910/
- Crossfire (4 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15121/
- X-Lake (4 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15911/
- Pie of Animosity (6 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15117/
- Great Sahara 2 (8 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15905/
- Hypothermia (9 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15906/
- Nine Lives (9 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15161/
- Imminent Destruction (12 players) http://resource.openra.net/maps/15908/

Some of the maps I've reuploaded to accommodate standards of #11876

data.title: WithInfantryBody only supports a single firing animation.
data.body: This is a problem with artwork like http://ppmforums.com/viewtopic.php?t=42518 which has more firing animations for different weapons.

data.title: Unpack RA movies on install.

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body: Fixes #11741.

data.title: Disable smooth turning for 180 degree turns.

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body: Fixes #11857.

data.title: Draw GPS dots above the fog.

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body: Fixes an omission from #11862.  This makes the dots work with the depth buffer enabled, and has the nice polish side-effect of rendering above the fog.

data.title: TS medic crawl shadow frames correction.
data.body: Small mistake on the shadow frames of the GDI medic for the crawl sequences, it was using the shadow frames of the last idle animation.

data.title: Add UpgradeOnMovement trait
data.body:
As the name states, the trait provides upgrades while an actor is moving, this can be used to increase inaccuracy while moving, give the unit a more vulnerable armor type while moving and so on.

This nicely complements our set of upgrades-providing traits.

The trait is upgradable itself, which could be used to switch the provided upgrades manually in conjunction with `DeployToUpgrade`.

data.title: Mobile/Move IsMoving check is not 100% reliable while turning
data.body: According to my tests with `WithMoveAnimation` in conjunction with `Mobile` ground actors, the `IsMoving` check occasionally seems to return `false` while turning, despite the recent attempts to improve the `IMove.IsMoving` reliability.

data.title: WithAttackAnimation and WithMoveAnimation can't handle conditions
data.body:
Meaning neither are the traits upgradable themselves, nor can they handle multiple sprite bodies.
- [x] Make `WithAttackAnimation` capable of handling multiple sprite bodies. #13350
- [x] Make `WithAttackAnimation` conditional. #13350
- [x] Make `WithMoveAnimation` capable of handling multiple sprite bodies. #13294
- [x] Make `WithMoveAnimation` conditional.

data.title: Add GPS icons for oil derricks, hospitals and biolabs
data.body:
During a game I noticed that hospitals and oil derricks aren't shown if you have GPS.
I added an hospital and an oil derrick icon to fix this.
Hospital:
![openra-2016-08-26t120349331z](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/21260178/18004871/f73df4fa-6b96-11e6-8de0-2643539cf890.png)

Oil Derrick:
![openra-2016-08-26t112543636z](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/21260178/18005020/aec2367c-6b97-11e6-9a91-36b2e2ee0abf.png)

data.title: Remove legacy A* visualisation.
data.body:
This visualization looks fun, but hasn't been useful for as long as I can remember.  It needs a complete rewrite before it will properly with isometric or heightmap-enabled mods.

This PR puts the feature out of its misery so that it doesn't cause any more maintenance burden until it is next needed.  If that time ever comes it can then be re-implemented in a way that works for all mods (e.g. using color-tinted sprite overlays or whatever technique we end up using for #3605).

data.title: Allow keeping empty selection bars visible
data.body:
External mods might want to display bars even when they are empty.

In my example, I want a bar displaying heat level stay visible even if the current heat level is zero.

data.title: Fixed false positive on sequence sprite checks
data.body:
Fixes

```
mono --debug OpenRA.Utility.exe ts --check-sequence-sprites
Tileset: Temperate
    File not found: ^BasicInfantry.shp
```

etc.

data.title: Fix issuing orders when releasing RMB after joystick-scrolling

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body:
Fixes #11849.

Please test this properly, there may be regressions lurking here which I haven't found yet or am unable to find since my use of the controls is different from how other people use theirs. (I never ran into the original bug in the first place, for example.)

data.title: Allow download window to be closed on failed downloads.

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body: Fixes #11843. Regression from #11745.

data.title: Explain the Inherits: syntax for Traits
data.body: It's not there

data.title: Official Map Pool Overhaul
data.body:
Includes:

1) Map alterations (balance, aesthetics) - 16 maps #11143

2) Map preview fixes for lobby viewing (order of spawn letters, visibility of ore mines) - 21 maps ##11698

Closes #11875

data.title: Official Map Pool Overhaul
data.body:

1) Map alterations (balance, aesthetics) - 16 maps #11143

2) Map preview fixes for lobby viewing (oreder of spawn letters, visibility of ore mines) - 21 maps ##11698

Closes #11143 (map alteration master ticket) #11714 #11682 #11701 #11708 #11530 #11208 #11683 #11700 #11681 #11713 #11529 #11711 #11209 #11210 #11709 #11710 (map alterations)
#11847 (map preview fixes)

data.title: Fatal Error
data.body: so i got it up and running and it was working for a bit then i changed the volume and now it wont run. i checked the logs and its [Exception of type System.IO.FileNotFoundException: The system cannot find the file specified. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80070002)] anyone have a quick fix for this?
